channel.title: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://"http://google.com/runescape-development/google/projects/366034-borderscape-never-get-same-equipment-twice.html"][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1887181/Logo.PNG[/img][/URL]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1887300/Item_Generation.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1892592/100_.gif[/img]
Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wMdWVToGFwI]BorderScape - 1,000,000 items and counting! - YouTube[/url]
Each item is generated randomly, same rarity scale as Borderlands (white lowest, pearlescent highest). There are 20 different prefixes (currently, will add more when I feel bored), all which have different tendencies for stat modification. In this video, I show myself spawning abyssal whips but I should have done armor to show more variety as whips only really show slash and strength bonus but w/e. Rare items are usually better but not always.
Items are saved on logout/server shutdown/etc and can be dropped/traded/banked/etc without losing properties. Each is unique.
Check it out! [/center]
*Note: Any comments that talk about how difficult this is or your programming 'skills' will be reported. This thread is to show off my feature, not be harassed for doing so-called 'easy' or 'hard' things.

item.title: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

This sounds pretty cool.

Read full topic
item.source: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items

item.title: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:32, topic:425456”]By the sounds of it, you get them via NPC drops and the server generates a unique ID to a weapon (almost like a child ID to the parent item ID) and each sub child ID for each parent item ID has different stats.

This seems like a difficult concept for some people to get their heads around.[/quote]

Seems fun to me. I like playing with things like that.

Read full topic

item.source: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items

item.title: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Owner Fritz, post:24, topic:425456”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=528120.msg3851690#msg3851690 date=1324074843]

I love the diversity this would bring. Playing RS/RSPS nowadays gets kind of boring after a while because you know everything already. With this it adds a sense of “wow, what does this do?”.

Suggestion: give a variety of special effects to certain types of the same weapon for extra variation. Another suggestion: don’t take it to heart if some people call this stupid, because then it makes you look bad.

I would suggest maybe changing the colours slightly, too. Not enough to make them look cheesy, but enough to be noticable.

My system has support for it but I’d need a dump of all model original colors

Make one? Not difficult. O.o
[/quote]

Meh…

How much difference in color do you think would look fine?[/quote]

Maybe add more of a sheen to certain weapons. Try to use the hues that the weapon has. If it’s a dull weapon, make the new colour dull. Bright, make the new one bright.

Read full topic
item.source: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items

item.title: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Fritz Owner Fritz
item.description:
@Owner_Fritz wrote:

sinisoul:

I’d just add a packet to recolor a model stored in the client’s model cache, and then just play around with that.

I know how to do it lol, I’m asking how big of a color change are you talking.

Read full topic

  2. Talk out your ass a bit less. Until you do it yourself, don’t make comments on how ‘hard’ it is.[/quote]

item.title: [Borderscape] 1,000,000 unique weapons and counting! - Borderlands style items
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

sinisoul:

I don’t see this working.

That’s what I said about your penis.

Primadude:

I don’t see a point to this - Why have that many versions of the same item? Your RuneScape emulation future has gone down the drain if you’re wasting your time doing this.

They have different stats and such. I guess you’ve never played Borderlands? Take a suggestion and go learn what a GOOD game is.

Read full topic
